titleStmt.title: Ouidius Naso his Remedie of love. Translated and intituled to the youth of England
Remedia amoris. English
titleStmt.author: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D.
F. L., fl. 1600.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. C[reede] for Iohn Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleetstreet, at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Fleetstreet, at the signe of the Bible
